Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.server

Class VirtualView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.server.VirtualView
All Implemented Interfaces:
InputViewInterface, ServerInputViewInterface, ServerUpdateViewInterface, UpdateViewInterface
public class VirtualView extends Object implements ServerUpdateViewInterface, ServerInputViewInterface
This class represents a client on the server-side. VirtualViews are instantiated once per client. It listens for message from the client (coming from the network) and notifies the Lobby/Controller. It is used by the Lobby and the Controller to send messages to the client. All methods inherited from ServerInputViewInterface take the lock on this. All other methods are thread-safe and do not take the lock on this.

      public void insertInBookshelf(BookshelfInsertion message)

      Specified by:

      Parameters:

      Parameters:

    • disconnect

      public void disconnect()
      Processes a network disconnection. It synchronizes on this. Internally it requires the lock on the assigned Controller and on Lobby in a non-nested way.
      Specified by:
      disconnect in interface ServerInputViewInterface
